channel.title: Continous Learning on Website
channel.description: Recent content in Continous Learning on Website

item.title: Continuing my education
item.description: Edit - July 15th, 2024: After about a month of attempting this system I am putting it on pause. There are a few problems I have encountered thus far: Despite setting a goal of 7 hours per week, I have not put in place a real system to achieve this goal. 7 hours per week is difficult to achieve during weeks of extended work or vacation, the system does not account for this.
